Class ProductDBAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • Dao.MySQLAccess
      • Dao.ProductDBAccess
  • public class ProductDBAccess
extends MySQLAccess
    This class represents product database in coffeeGo web app. It is derived from MySOLAccess class
